name: City Bus Driving Simulator Pro
description:
Bus Simulator 2018

We Bring Exciting New Simulator Game for Simulation games lovers... Get your Top Drives and Drive it in Traffic Rush for PUBLIC TRANSPORT ...

Do you want to become a real Bus Driver? Play the latest Driving Simulator simulation game : Bus Simulator ! Realistic environments, detailed bus vehicles, complex interiors will make you feel like a real Bus driving ! Get on board and drive the bus to complete all the routes! Create your own personalized routes. Next-gen graphics with articulated, double and Public Transport will make this simulator the best on the market! A new traffic system will let you enjoy Bus driving like never before. Get Bus Simulator!

Enter the simulation world, Play BUS SIMULATOR! You have the best City Bus ... have some Fun with this PUBLIC TRANSPORT SIMULATOR ...
So Get a Driving Licence from DRIVING SCHOOL and enjoy City Bus Driving and become a skilled Bus Driver of New York City


Features:
- Drive in the city, desert, mountain and highway
- Steering Wheel, Buttons, Tilting and the awesome real mode with clutch from Driving School
- Many detailed Buses (articulated, double-decker, school, london etc...)
- Open/Close Doors button
- Mirrors (also from inside)
- Cool weather conditions (awesome new rain)
- AI Trafic: new smooth vehicles, that use blinkers, realistic physics and brakes...
- Free Ride Mode
- Realistic visual damage
- Learn to drive a manual transmission with H-Pattern
- Detailed Interiors

Awesome levels with different driving conditions are waiting for you. Show off your driving skills, get your driving license now From Driving School! Play Bus Driving Simulator!
